about_the_game:
About This Game

"STAMP" is a very exciting shooter where your main job is to KILL zombies and complete the main task. Meanwhile you have a lot of stuff to try like perks, new weapons or side quests. We can play in a few diffrent ways, you can just speedrun your task and complete the mission, but you can also play it slowly pick-up drops from zombie which will make your better, attempt on finding Easter-Egg's, upgrade your equipment by perks or by upgrade your weapon, use a items that will make your gameplay simplier or just make more advantages on killing zombies from available items in game.


Upgrade Your Equipment

You have a lot of ways to upgrade your character, you can do it just by buying perks which can you give a lot of adventages that you can use against ZOMBIES! You can also visit a trader who sell a upgrades for your weapon which makes you better on smashing zombies. Also you can buy an Armor that will help you with dealing with zombies. Upgrading weapon it is not only a bigger magazine, it makes your weapon simplier in use it means that you will have better accurancy on targets, lower recoil, bigger damage and an addons like sight or silencer.


Get Better and Better By Buying Perks

Perks is unique part of our game. At the moment you have 8 perks which makes diffrent advantages while playing. Starting from increase HEALTH ending by modifying your bullets of weapon which can froze zombies. You can also find perks that will increase your weapon DAMAGE, make your character faster or just show zombies behind walls something like x-ray which in our game we call it "BloodScanner". Don't forget perks that can make you more lucky or just make your hands faster which will impact on weapon reload.

content_descriptors.notes: Killing zombies, a lot of blood, shooting, explosives

About the Game

About This Game

"STAMP" is a very exciting shooter where your main job is to KILL zombies and complete the main task. Meanwhile you have a lot of stuff to try like perks, new weapons or side quests. We can play in a few diffrent ways, you can just speedrun your task and complete the mission, but you can also play it slowly pick-up drops from zombie which will make your better, attempt on finding Easter-Egg's, upgrade your equipment by perks or by upgrade your weapon, use a items that will make your gameplay simplier or just make more advantages on killing zombies from available items in game.


Upgrade Your Equipment

You have a lot of ways to upgrade your character, you can do it just by buying perks which can you give a lot of adventages that you can use against ZOMBIES! You can also visit a trader who sell a upgrades for your weapon which makes you better on smashing zombies. Also you can buy an Armor that will help you with dealing with zombies. Upgrading weapon it is not only a bigger magazine, it makes your weapon simplier in use it means that you will have better accurancy on targets, lower recoil, bigger damage and an addons like sight or silencer.


Get Better and Better By Buying Perks

Perks is unique part of our game. At the moment you have 8 perks which makes diffrent advantages while playing. Starting from increase HEALTH ending by modifying your bullets of weapon which can froze zombies. You can also find perks that will increase your weapon DAMAGE, make your character faster or just show zombies behind walls something like x-ray which in our game we call it "BloodScanner". Don't forget perks that can make you more lucky or just make your hands faster which will impact on weapon reload.
name: STAMP

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Intel i5-2500 3.3GHz or AMD r3 1200 3.1GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 2GB or AMD r9 270x 2GB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 4460 3.2GHz or AMD r3 1200 3.1GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 4GB or AMD rx580 4GB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: "STAMP" is a very exciting shooter where your main job is to KILL zombies and complete the main task. Meanwhile you have a lot of stuff to try like perks, new weapons or side quests.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
